metadata.title: CVE-2024-43437 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in moodle. Insufficient sanitizing of data when performinga restore could result in a cross-site scripting (XSS) risk from maliciousbackup files.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
